title: Looking for a team
body:
Hi,

looking to join a team to have fun and climb the ladder, I main support/top/marksmen currently Gold 5,

if you would like to add me - beyondrepair

replies.body:
Looking to put together a gold/plat team. Add me if your interested. Already have a few who are keen. 

IGN: FNC RekkIes
Hey Rekkles, I am gold 5 aswell main top and adc, can do all roles weakest is jungle. Add me Xiaoma as i am interested! Thanks
